sentence.Network_en: Others feel apathetic about the candidates in both parties.
sentence.Network_cn: 其他人对两党的候选人都不感兴趣。

sentence.Network_en: Even the most apathetic students are beginning to sit up and listen.
sentence.Network_cn: 连最不感兴趣的学生都开始坐直了听讲。

sentence.Network_en: The illness made her apathetic and unwilling to meet people.
sentence.Network_cn: 疾病使她冷漠，不愿见人。

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... apathy n． 漠然，冷淡 apathetic adj． 冷漠的，无动于衷的 aperture n． 孔隙，窄的缺口.
词根联想记忆法词汇教程(一)|联想记忆法背单词 ... anxious adj. 渴望的 apathetic adj. 冷淡的 aperture n. 孔，开口.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... apathy n 冷淡，漠不关心 apathetic a 冷漠的 sympathy n 同情，怜悯.
麻字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 麻木〖 numb〗 麻木不仁〖 unconcerned;apathetic;benumbed;insensate〗 麻雀〖 sparrow〗.

means.word_mean: 冷淡的,麻木的,无动于衷的

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from apathy,on the pattern of pathetic

entry.tran: 漠然的;漠不关心的;无动于衷的
entry.def: If you describe someone as apathetic, you are criticizing them because they do not seem to be interested in or enthusiastic about doing anything.

example.ex: Even the most apathetic students are beginning to sit up and listen...
example.tran: 连最不感兴趣的学生都开始坐直了听讲。

example.ex: Others feel apathetic about the candidates in both parties.
example.tran: 其他人对两党的候选人都不感兴趣。

means.word_mean: 1. showing little or no emotion or animation;

sentences.sentence: "a woman who became active rather than apathetic as she grew older"

means.word_mean: 2. marked by a lack of interest;

sentences.sentence: "the universe is neither hostile nor friendly; it is simply indifferent"

auth_sentence.content: Most of us these days are apathetic towards religion.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of us these days are apathetic towards religion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of us these days are apathetic towards religion.

auth_sentence.content: The apathetic neglect that England maintains towards all American composers.
auth_sentence.res_content: The apathetic neglect that England maintains towards all American composers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The apathetic neglect that England maintains towards all American composers.

auth_sentence.content: Most people are at best reactionary, and in general apathetic.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most people are at best reactionary, and in general apathetic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most people are at best reactionary, and in general apathetic.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"人或科学"; 2. 表形容词,通常放在名词后,表示"与……相关的,……的"; 3. 表名词,"某种药或医学有关"

stems_affixes.word_buile: lunate月+ic人或科学→lunatic月亮的圆缺引起精神病等

stems_affixes.value_cn: 浪漫的,传奇式的;不切实际的,好幻想的

a无,缺乏+pathe=path感情+tic与……相关的,……的→无动于衷的
aroma芳香+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.芳香的
chao混乱+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.混乱的
charisma超凡魅力,感召力+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.有魅力的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 戏剧的,戏剧性的;剧烈的

enigma谜+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.神秘的,难解的
gene因子,基因+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.遗传[学]的 n.[-s]遗传学
schema=scheme图解,摘要+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.扼要的,图解的
psych心理[的]+o+tic人或科学→adj.&n.精神病的,疯子
lunate月+ic人或科学→lunatic月亮的圆缺引起精神病等
gene因子,基因+tic与……相关的,……的→adj.遗传[学]的 n.[-s]遗传学
anti反+bio生命+tic某种药或医学有关→反生命→反细菌→抗生素
a无,缺乏+path感情+etic表形容词→无动于衷的
path感情+etic表形容词→动感情的
anti反+path感情+y状态→n.反感

stems_affixes.value_cn: 缺乏感情或兴趣, 冷漠

path病+ology学科→病的学科→病理学
path痛苦+os表名词→n.哀婉,悲怆
psycho精神+path病→精神病人
sym共同+path感情+y状态→共同感情→同情

sentences.en: I realised I was becoming increasingly depressed and apathetic.
sentences.cn: 我意识到自己越来越消沉、越来越冷漠了。

sentences.en: You won’t succeed if you are apathetic.
sentences.cn: 要是你冷淡,你就不能成功。
